0.0.1.name: The bedroom of an Inn
0.0.1.description: This is a small, dimly lit, carpeted room.

0.1.1.name: The Inn's upstairs hallway
0.1.1.description: Though sunlight shines through the windows, the Inn itself is completely silent, save for your footsteps and the creaking of the wood floor.

0.1.0.name: The Inn's lobby
0.1.0.description: A simple lobby. Papers are scattered about the front counter and several tables and chairs are turned over. Apparently, you slept through something rather chaotic.

0.0.0.name: Outside the Inn
0.0.0.description: You stand on the main road of a small town. This is the end of the line, partner.

1.0.0.name: In the road
1.0.0.description: The road is empty. The town is empty. You, on the other hand, are not.
